descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jayson Tatum goes one-on-one with Kevin Durant early in the first quarter and pulls up to drain a step-back 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tatum knocks down step-back 3 on KD) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tatum knocks down step-back 3 on KD

videos.description: Kevin Durant quickly drives to the basket and takes flight to throw down a powerful dunk in the lane.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Durant darts to the rack for a throwdown) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Durant darts to the rack for a throwdown

videos.description: Kyrie Irving pulls out all the stops as he uses multiple moves to break down Evan Fournier down to the ground and drives in for a tough layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kyrie breaks down Fournier for a tough bucket) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kyrie breaks down Fournier for a tough bucket

videos.description: Kevin Durant is called for a charge but falls hard as he barrels into Marcus Smart and crashes to the ground awkwardly.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD gets up after nasty fall in 2nd quarter) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD gets up after nasty fall in 2nd quarter

videos.description: Robert Williams III ties a Celtics playoffs record as he rejects Nicolas Claxton to come up with his seventh block of the game.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Robert Williams III rejects Nicolas Claxton for 7th block of the game) 2021/05/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Robert Williams III rejects Nicolas Claxton for 7th block of the game
